abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the project are to: 1)
            constuct large scale water resources works (Changma
            Reservoir); 2) rebuild the Shuangta Reservoir; 3) enlarge
            Chijin Reservoir; 4) construct drainage works; 5) reclaim
            516 ha of barren land; 6) resettle .2 million immigrants
            from the middle and southern part of Gansu Province; and 7)
            construct relevant agriculture auxiliary services.  The
            objectives of this environmental impact assessment are to:
            ensure the efficient utilization of water, soil, light and
            heat resources in the watershed; assist the resettlements of
            immigrants from the middle and southern parts of Gansu
            Province; and to monitor the environmental hazards in the
            early stage of the project construction.  The assessment
            identifies the following environmental impacts: soil
            waterclogging, salinization, land desertification,
            vegetation damage, and land submersion. In addition, the
            study reviews the effects of the project on: resettlement
            environment capacity, human health, water resource
            utilization, and surface water quality.
